data.text: @RomaTorreNYC @HelloDollyBway @BetteMidler And Donna Murphy is the third coming!
@RomaTorreNYC @HelloDollyBway @BetteMidler Amen! Magical evening! Thank you @BetteMidler, cast, crew, orchestra!

@RomaTorreNYC @HelloDollyBway @BetteMidler Great review!! I've seen the show 10 times w/ her: 6 times during the first run and 4 times recently, and I think shes at her best now. Funniest I've ever seen it. I've never seen her do a particular scene the same way in all the times I've seen...shes constantly changing it up.

@bikeloveny @RomaTorreNYC @HelloDollyBway by the way she’s 72 years old if i was 72 and doing almost 8 shows a week on broadway i would be tired too... everyone is entitled to their own opinion but you have to consider her age

@bikeloveny @HelloDollyBway It’s been a long run for her. It’s astonishing to me how actors are able to go on night after night and maintain fresh performances. It must get to be a slog after a while. Nice chatting with you.

@RomaTorreNYC @HelloDollyBway Thanks for reply. Love your reviews which I find very helpful and usually agree with you(!). Yes consummate stage actress -  the reason I was so looking forward to this. Seen her before. I think she's bored with the part. No excuse. Expensive ticket.
@bikeloveny @HelloDollyBway We’re all entitled to our opinions of course but fact: she’s an excellent stage actress. “...back where she belongs” = on the live stage.

@RomaTorreNYC @HelloDollyBway I just saw hello Dolly 2 days ago. Midler stopped the action more than once just 2 mug - for as long as 5 minutes! Ugh. Hammy direction dumb play. Why is it so nice to see her back where she belongs when we've never seen her there in the 1st place? DHPierce's accent? Thumbs down.
@RomaTorreNYC @BetteMidler @HelloDollyBway We saw her recently and she was simply divine! 100% worth it.
